attributes.action: Reopen golf courses for 2 people per group to golf.
attributes.additional_details: Because for a high majority of golfers this is their daily/weekly exercise and if you can exersize outside with 1 other person why cant you golf in a 2.
attributes.background: Reopen golf course s so that 2 people can golf together

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557167
